issue.title: [C++] Support nesting of function registries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16677](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16677). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
#### 
Currently, only a default function-registry is supported. Modifying this registry has global effects, which is often undesirable. Support for nesting function-registries will provide scoping for such modifications.
